data.message: Aurora gradient characteristics: 1) Smooth transitions between colors radiating from center, 2) Often uses grain/noise texture for natural appearance, 3) Multiple color stops with easeInOut easing for smooth transitions, 4) Can be liquid/fluid, linear, or radial styles. CSS syntax: radial-gradient(circle at center, rgba(color, 1) 0%, rgba(color, 0) 70%). Apple, Instagram, Stripe use aurora effects professionally.
